title: Patch Notes
content: including dead avatars that can't be resurrected. Fixed an issue where a dead Shadowheart could still trigger a dialogue at camp with Nightsong. Fixed a rare bug where being arrested by the marching army when trying to get to Baldur's Gate for the second time could lead to player characters who were present during the first arrest, but not during the second arrest, to still be teleported into the prison cell in Moonrise Towers.
